title: Define Anytron specification
description:
## Requirements
- Create openspec-compatible specification for Anytron
- Anytron generates static websites for TV show quote search and meme generation (like Frinkiac/Morbotron)
- CLI tool that processes video + subtitle files to generate a complete website

## Acceptance Criteria
- Spec passes `openspec validate --specs --strict`
- Spec includes all core requirements: CLI interface, frame extraction, subtitle parsing, search index, generated website features
- Spec follows openspec format with Purpose and Requirements sections

## Context
- Spec file: openspec/specs/anytron/spec.md
- Project conventions: openspec/project.md
- Similar sites: Frinkiac (frinkiac.com), Morbotron (morbotron.com)
